duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive store sales and metrics through providing excellent customer service to each customer.
Execute customer facing merchandising standards throughout the store.
Merchandise new receipts in a way that aligns with the brand, appeals to the customer, and encourages purchase.
Proactively greet and engage customers warmly with a smile.
Meet or exceed solicitation goal for Belk credit Rewards program.
Meet or exceed personal sales per hour goals.
Increase units sold per transaction by recommending products to customers.
Identify and reduce shrinkage in the area.
Work professionally with co-workers, customers, and managers to accomplish defined tasks.
Maintain floor and stock areas consistent with store standards.
Follow procedures for all systems including counts, markdowns, maintain and inventory control.
Assist Operations teams with non-sell duties as assigned by Sales Team Manager.

education_certification.credential: No education requirement. Experience in retail preferred
